events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further action.
A recruiter has now been assigned to your profile to help coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
The initial screening interview has been scheduled to discuss your experience in software development and DevOps.
Thank you for the opportunity; I am excited about the role and look forward to the upcoming interviews.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 20th to assess your coding and system design skills.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and understanding.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your career goals and workplace fit on May 25th.
Your HR interview went well, covering your motivations and alignment with the companyâ€™s culture.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role with competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback about the offer and the recruitment process so far.
The candidate has accepted the offer and is eager to start contributing to the engineering team.
Onboarding has started with orientation and initial training sessions scheduled for your first week.
The hiring process is now officially closed, and the new engineer is fully integrated into the team.
